doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 1 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 12/31/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 1 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 12/31/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:Special Episode "1986 in Review," with GCN clips and coverage from the year1. Gay and Lesbian Alliance Against Defamation protests outside the New York Post offices 2. Coverage of the National Gay and Lesbian Taskforce meeting, featuring interviews with Sara Throne, Virginia Apuzzo, Peter Fowler, Urvashi Vaid on the impact and continuing future of the gay service organizationCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine3. Mayor Koch attacked at the Proclamation of 1987 Gay Pride Week4. Andy Humm on the 17th anniversary of the Stonewall Riots5. Raymond Jacobs on the psychological impact of AIDS on communities6. Gay Friends and Neighbors in Brooklyn7. Coverage of the 17th Annual Gay and Lesbian Pride Day Parade in New York, 29 June 1986COMMERCIAL: The Monster8. Raymond Jacobs on dealing with AIDS related deaths in the young gay community9. Clips from the July 4th 1986 NYC protest against the Supreme Court passage of the "Sodomy Laws"10. Interview with Michael Hardwick, of the Bowers v. Hardwick Georgia "Sodomy Laws" case, and discussion of the case11. Lyndon LaRouche placing the "AIDS quarantine" initiative on the California ballotCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazineCOMMERCIAL: Dr. Ruth taping, call for gay guests to attend12. "Stamp Out AIDS" project, interview with John Glines13. Gay Christopher St Festival Committee sponsors a candlelight vigil for AIDS Resources Center Inc, which cares for homeless persons with AIDS14. Gina Alvarez discusses the increase of activism of young gay students, especially on college campuses15. Human Rights Campaign Fund Dinner, with speeches by Coretta Scott King and Harvey Fierstein16. Closing credits, over clips of the Village Halloween Parade
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 1 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 12/31/1986]: circa 1986 - 1987
